title: Book Cover, "Bookjacket for "Hard Candy" by Tennessee Williams, New Directions Books", 1959
medium: Lithograph on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically at lower left edge in black ink: elaine lustig
Across the bottom in black ink: hard candy
Vertically at top left edge in black ink: TENNESSEE WILLIAMS 
Down cover vertically on spine in black ink: hard candy TENNESSEE WILIAMS 
At lower right in black: jacket design by Elaine Lustif/ A NEW DIRECTIONS BOOK
provenance: Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff; 1993: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The cover has a pale yellow background that takes up 2/3 of the cover. The rest is white. On the cover is the image of hard candies and a synopsis of the short stories in the book. On the back cover is a synopsis of "One Arm," an earlier book of short stories and a list of books by Tennessee Williams.

tombstone.epitaph: Book Cover, "Bookjacket for "Hard Candy" by Tennessee Williams, New Directions Books", 1959. Lithograph on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-53.
